input.sentences: a man looks out upon the water of a wilderness preserve .
he sees some interesting sediment along the bank .
he decides to walk across the bridge for a better view .
when he turns around | he can see lakeside houses in the distance .
he even marvels at the dew on the pine needles of the trees .
output.sentences: The wilderness featured a water preserve.
There is sediment in the bank of the water preserve.
A man talks a walk and appreciates the view. He decides to keep walking.
While he walks across the water preserve along the lakeside, he can see houses in the distance.
In the wilderness, there are also trees with pine needles.
